greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n^3*Product_{p|n} (1 + 1/p).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^e*p^(2*e-1)*(p+1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 16 2001
a(n) = A001615(n^3) = A001615(n^k)/n^(k-3), with k>2. - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Mar 06 2012
mathematica: a[n_] := n*DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] DivisorSigma[1, #^2]&]; Array[a, 40] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 02 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
